summary.span: 以進階文件功能裝載及格式化非固定格式內容，例如編頁和資料行。

span.span: Hosts and formats flow content with advanced document features, such as pagination and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 中包含的最上層的子元素必須衍生自。Top-level child elements contained in a must be derived from . 有效的最上層子項目包括下列各項：Valid top-level child elements include the following: - - - - - 預設值for包含用來顯示文件，如果您使用XAML 檔案中的根項目。The default for contains a that is used to display the document if you use as the root element in a XAML file. 如果不是根項目，可以在顯示的文件，則，或控制項。If is not the root element, the document can be displayed in a , a , or a control. 您也可以編輯在控制項。You can also edit a in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效輸入型別的`block`包括， ， ， ，和。Valid input types for `block` include , , , , and . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 在此情況下，包含流程項目區塊結構執行巢狀在段落中文字所組成。In this case, the contains a flow element block structure consisting of a text run nested in a paragraph. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentConstructorSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentconstructorsimple)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentConstructorSimple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentconstructorsimple)] 下列範例以程式設計方式建構簡單的 2x2 資料表，然後使用建構函式來建立新的包含資料表。The following example programmatically constructs a simple 2 x 2 table and then uses the constructor to create a new containing the table. 雖然使用較為複雜的流程項目區塊結構時，使用建構函式是如上述範例所示相同的。Though a somewhat more complicated flow element block structure is used, use of the constructor is the same as in the preceding example. MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ColumnGap { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ColumnGap : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定欄間距值，這個值表示 中各欄的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the column gap value, which indicates the spacing between columns in a .

value.span: 欄間距 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: The column gap, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 值為(相當於屬性值"自動") 指出欄間距等於屬性。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") indicates that the column gap is equal to the property.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前的資料行間距。Getting this property returns the current column gap. 設定此值會變更目前有效的欄間距，而可能導致自動重排內容。Setting this value changes the currently effective column gap, and may cause content to reflow. 欄間距不能超過目前除外。The column gap cannot exceed the current minus any . 如果值屬性超出此限制，有效的資料行間距會降低觀察這項限制。If the value of the property exceeds this limit, the effective column gap is reduced to observe this limit. 如果這個屬性就不會影響是`null`。This property has no effect if is `null`. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得或設定用來繪製資料行之間尺規的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the used to draw the rule between columns.

value.span: 資料行之間繪製尺規則時要使用的 ，或者若不使用背景筆刷，則為 。

span.span: A to use when drawing the rule line between columns, or to not use a background brush.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行的規則是內容的一條的資料行之間會畫上和用來以視覺化方式分隔資料行。The column rule is a line that is drawn between columns, and is used to visually separate columns of content. 如需顯示可用的預先定義筆刷色彩的樣本的表格，請參閱。For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see . 如果這個屬性就不會影響屬性為 0 或`null`。This property has no effect if the property is 0 or `null`. 當有兩個或多個資料行，會顯示資料行的規則。Column rules are displayed only when there are two or more columns. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentcolumnrule)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentcolumnrule)]

summary.span: 取得或設定欄尺規寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the column rule width.

value.span: 欄尺規寬度 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: The column rule width, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行的規則是內容的一條的資料行之間會畫上和用來以視覺化方式分隔資料行。The column rule is a line that is drawn between columns, and is used to visually separate columns of content. 如果這個屬性就不會影響屬性是`null`。This property has no effect if the property is `null`. 有兩個或多個資料行時，只會顯示資料行的規則。Column rules are only displayed when there are two or more columns. 欄尺規寬度限制為小於或等於。The column rule width is constrained to be less than or equal to the . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ColumnWidth { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ColumnWidth : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定欄的最小所需寬度 (以 為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum desired width of the columns in a .

value.span: 最低所需的資料行寬度，以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

span.span: The minimum desired column width, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 無論頁面寬度為何， 的值只會導致顯示一欄。

span.span: A value of causes only one column to be displayed, regardless of the page width.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A動態調整到最大可用顯示空間內的內容呈現其內容。A dynamically adjusts its contents to maximize content presentation within the available display space. 可見的資料行的數目取決於可容納在可用的顯示空間中，指定這個屬性所指定的最小的資料行寬度資料行數目。The number of visible columns is determined by the number of columns that can fit in available display space, given the minimum column width specified by this property. 實際的資料行寬度可能會大於這個屬性所指定的值。The actual column width may be greater than the value specified by this property. 變更任一方向中視窗的大小，將會導致資料行正在以動態方式重新產生以發揮最大的空間。Changing the size of the window in either direction will result in columns being dynamically regenerated to make the best use of space. 如此一來，內容動態調整到使用者的環境。In this way, the content dynamically adapts to the user's environment. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 中內容的相對流向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content in a .

value.span: 其中一個 值，這個值會指定相對流向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前有效的流向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 設定這個屬性會導致內容中指定的方向重新流動。Setting this property causes the contents of the to reflow in the indicated direction. 的內容通常會對應到所表示之語言的固有流向。The of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯來文和阿拉伯文會自然方向由右至左的語言的範例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英文、 德文和俄文會自然流程從左到右的語言的範例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性的值不會自動變更為符合作業系統所使用的語言。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果您需要使用不同的值，則預設值是，您必須指定它自己。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentflowdirectionxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentflowdirection)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentflowdirection)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 的慣用最上層字型系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

value.span: 用於指定慣用字型系列的 物件，或具有一個或多個後援字型系列的主要慣用字型系列。

span.span: A object specifying the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 預設值是 值所決定的字型。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何子項目上的設定會覆寫這個最上層的設定。Any settings on child elements will override this top-level setting. 如果未指定多個系列的第二個和後續的字型系列會作為後援，可在其中主要字型系列是無法使用或不適用的情況下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此屬性會指定只在喜好設定。This property specifies a preference only. 如果無法使用，指定的字型家族會以無訊息模式切換回所決定的字型值。If the specified font family is not available, the will silently fall back to the font determined by the value. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsColumnWidthFlexible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsColumnWidthFlexible : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 值是彈性或固定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the value is flexible or fixed.

value.span: 如果欄寬度為彈性則為 ，如果欄寬度為固定則為 。

span.span: if the column width is flexible; if the column width is fixed.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定任何多餘內容區域寬度 （也就是頁寬] 和 [寬度的內容之後在配置, 之間的差異） 分散的資料行的方式。The property determines the manner in which any excess content area width (that is, the difference between the page width and the width of the content after it is laid out) is distributed among columns. 如果設定為`true`方法，分佈多餘的空間平均每個資料行; 在此情況下，除了所指定的寬度可能要調整大小資料行屬性。A setting of `true` means that the extra space is distributed equally to each column; in this case, columns may be sized wider than the width specified by the property. 如果設定為`false`表示多餘的空間會發佈到頁面右側填補; 資料行一律在此情況下，調整到所指定的寬度屬性 (只要該寬度是減去任何頁面的寬度小於 < c4 個 > )。A setting of `false` means excess space is distributed to the padding on the right side of the page; in this case, columns will always size to the width specified by the property (so long as that width is smaller than the width of the page minus any ). 下圖說明在配置的差異，當此屬性為`true`或`false`。The following figure illustrates the difference in layout when this property is `true` or `false`. 淺藍色代表資料行中的內容。Light blue represents columns of content in a . ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值")![Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlexXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentcolumnflexxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlex](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentcolumnflex)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlex](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentcolumnflex)]

Public Shared ReadOnly IsColumnWidthFlexibleProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsHyphenationEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsHyphenationEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值會指出是否啟用或停用字詞的自動斷字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation of words is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果啟用自動斷字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if automatic breaking and hyphenation of words is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動文字斷字功能可讓自動中斷和進行斷字，根據目前的版面配置條件。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 這可讓長字詞，若要開始在同一行，並繼續這個下一步，並傾向於達到合理的文字中的泛空白字元更均勻分佈。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 文字會中斷，並根據標準的文法規則進行無連字號。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. 自動斷字功能是特別有效結合最佳段落配置時 (由屬性)。Automatic hyphenation is particularly effective when coupled with optimal paragraph layout (represented by the property). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenthyphenatexaml)] 下圖顯示如何上述呈現。The following figure shows how the preceding renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 啟用 FlowDocument 連字號](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument 連字號已啟用")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下圖顯示如何相同的預設設定以呈現 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenthyphenate)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenthyphenate)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsHyphenationEnabledProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly IsHyphenationEnabledProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsOptimalParagraphEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsOptimalParagraphEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示要啟用或停用最佳段落配置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether optimal paragraph layout is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果啟用最佳段落配置則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if optimal paragraph layout is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最佳段落配置則會配置段落中的功能，泛空白字元會盡量平均分散。Optimal paragraph layout is a feature that lays out paragraphs in the such that white space is distributed as evenly as possible. 理論上來說，這會藉由消除令人分心的泛空白字元可以發生的行靠右對齊的文字和其他的配置常式提供最佳化的閱讀經驗。Theoretically, this provides an optimized reading experience by eliminating distracting white space that can occur with line-justified text and other layout routines. 最佳段落配置則特別有效使用自動斷字功能結合時 (由屬性)。Optimal paragraph layout is particularly effective when coupled with automatic hyphenation (represented by the property). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenthyphenatexaml)] 下圖顯示如何上述呈現。The following figure shows how the preceding renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 啟用 FlowDocument 連字號](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument 連字號已啟用")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下圖顯示如何相同的預設設定以呈現 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 已停用連字號的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenthyphenate)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenthyphenate)]

value.span: 值為(相當於屬性值"自動」) 會使行高由目前字型特性自動決定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更此值不會變更相關聯的文字; 的高度相反地，它會變更行包含文字的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 若要變更文字的大小，請使用屬性。To change the size of the text, use the property. 除了這個屬性，版面配置中的總行受到其屬性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: is set to a non-positive value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果上一段連續體中，檢視屬性會優先於屬性，接著會優先於屬性。If viewed on a continuum, the property takes precedence over the property, which in turn takes precedence over the property. 如果指定的頁面上設定所有三個屬性，這會是評估屬性的順序。If all three properties are set on a given page, this is the order in which the properties are evaluated. 這個屬性沒有作用時設為（自動）。This property has no effect when is set to (auto). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果上一段連續體中，檢視屬性會優先於屬性，接著會優先於屬性。If viewed on a continuum, the property takes precedence over the property, which in turn takes precedence over the property. 如果指定的頁面上設定所有三個屬性，這會是評估屬性的順序。If all three properties are set on a given page, this is the order in which the properties are evaluated. 這個屬性沒有作用時設為（自動）。This property has no effect when is set to (auto). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness PagePadding { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.PagePadding : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出頁面界限和頁面內容之間的填補空間寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thickness of padding space between the boundaries of a page and the page's content.

value.span: A結構，指定要套用的填補量與裝置無關的像素。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在所有方向的統一可描述 (`PagePadding="10"`)，或是為四個不同值，代表左前,，以滑鼠右鍵，然後底端填補獨立 (`PagePadding="5,0,10,20"`)。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`PagePadding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`PagePadding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的填補寬度超過對應的頁面維度 （例如，左和右邊框距離寬度的總和超過頁面寬度），填補的粗細會按比例縮小為不可大於相關頁面維度.If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding page dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the page width), the thickness of the padding will be proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant page dimension. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

[!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTextAlignmentXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenttextalignmentxaml)] 下圖顯示如何前置呈現與文字對齊方式 （預設值）。The following figure shows how the preceding renders with text alignment (the default). ![螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Left")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left") 下圖顯示如何相同呈現與文字對齊方式。The following figure shows how the same renders with text alignment. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 權限的 TextAlign 值](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 值為 Right")![Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right") 下圖顯示如何相同呈現與文字對齊方式。The following figure shows how the same renders with text alignment. ![螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是僅適用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字型。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 印刷樣式變化的效果不上不支援 variant 的字型。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 如需有關本主題的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WPF 中的印刷樣式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用的各種印刷樣式變化屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set various typography variations with the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTypographyXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenttypographyxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定各種層面屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set various aspects of the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTypography](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenttypography)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTypography](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenttypography)]
